content:
That's wonderful! I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited to try the recipe. Turmeric is an amazing spice that not only adds flavor but also provides numerous health benefits. It's a great way to incorporate anti-inflammatory properties into your meal.

Using fresh herbs from your garden as a garnish will definitely elevate the dish. Fresh herbs like parsley, dill, or cilantro will add a bright, refreshing flavor to the salmon. You can also consider using other herbs like thyme or rosemary if you have them in your garden.

Remember to adjust the amount of turmeric and ginger to your taste. Some people prefer a stronger turmeric flavor, while others like it more subtle. You can always add more, but it's harder to remove the flavor once it's added.

If you have any questions or need further guidance while cooking, feel free to ask. I'll be here to help. Otherwise, enjoy your delicious and healthy Baked Salmon with Turmeric and Ginger, and don't hesitate to share your experience or any variations you make to the recipe!

Happy cooking, and I hope you have a wonderful evening!
